attributes.action: Begin in earnest a justified and necessary regime change in Zimbabwe - by use of military force if necessary.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Most citizens of the UK feel that the Iraq war was unjustified and illegal.  Now it is time to regain the confidence of the UK electorate and worldwide opinion by bringing down and putting on trial for genocide Robert Mugabe and the ruling Zanu PF party in Zimbabwe.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
